QueryResult.text: SELECT s.prid id, (SELECT NVL(SUM(NVL(a.practsum,0))/SUM(NVL(a.practsum,0) + NVL(a.prestsum,0)),0) FROM PRASSIGNMENT a, PRTASK t, SRM_RESOURCES r WHERE a.prtaskid = t.prid AND t.prprojectid = s.prid AND a.prresourceid = r.id AND NVL(a.prestsum,0) + NVL(a.practsum,0) > 0 AND r.resource_type = 0) pct_complete FROM INV_PROJECTS s
